column2: an A.M. Eatery////While we were waiting to be seated we were chatting with the host and said we had never eaten there before. We were seated quickly. To our surprise
column3: the host came over with a complementary blueberry cream cheese stuffed pancake. Delicious. We both ordered the huevos rancheros. They were good
column4: but could have been spicier. All in all
column5: a nice place with nice people with good food and good service and you don't have to get up early.
